author: Gavin Owen
comment: Brilliant. Looks great, lots of customisation options, loads of fun for the time of year. Would love to be able to see date, watch battery and phone battery simultaneously - that would make it perfect.

author: Sean McFarland
comment: I love funky sweaters and I love this watch face. Nice job!

author: Brian Molony
comment: Good face

author: Tony Smith
comment: This is a cool watch face. Pick your sweater style and colors. Works great on my square watch (ZenWatch 2). Only issue is I would rather have a countdown to Christmas rather than the battery percentage. Still really cool.
title: Get in the Christmas spirit!

author: Bob Allen
comment: It's not bad, but the battery % is never right. Not a deal breaker, but very annoying sometimes. I wish I could just turn it off.
title: Well, not bad.

author: Kat Higgins
comment: You can customise the sweater to make a really tiny ugly Christmas jumper , best 73p I've ever spent
title: Excellent

author: Alex Zinni
comment: I just wish you could save 5 different watch faces and have them cycle like a desktop background.
title: Great, but....

author: Greg Buri
comment: Love it. Simple, with just enough options. Can set it to always have color, even in passive mode. Very satisfied customer.
title: Perfect Christmas Watch Face

author: Andy Paterson
comment: Great fun for the festive period. Works really well on my LG G Watch R.
title: Christmas Spirit

author: Michael Watkins
comment: Would be great with a weather widget

author: Vince Donald
comment: Can't see how to get more settings than just the red background.  Thanks for the reply, I had to factory reset my phone as NO Watch faces were showing in the App even though they were on the watch.  Now have a lovely green zig-zag just like the preview picture.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. All the settings are located on your mobile. Just go in the "Android Wear" app, and hit the "Gear" icon displayed over the watch face preview.

author: Marienne Figueroa
comment: Several designs to choose from, and nice face with black background when screen isn't fully on. I only saw circle faces for the screenshots do wasn't sure how it would be with my square face, but it looks fantastic!
title: Looks Great with my Square Watch Face!

author: Adam Dickison
comment: I don't love Android wear. I'm pretty firmly in the Pebble camp, but this watch face has made me want to wear my zen watch. It's absolutely delightful. Thanks!
title: Great watch face

author: Toikka
comment: Really customizable and lovely patterns! Would love to change ambient background separately as well, since my Urbane has an AMOLED screen.
title: Great seasonal watchface

author: Rory Glynn
comment: I bought this just to make my wrist a little more festive, but I've really been impressed by how well put together it is. Bravo!
title: Really impressive well built watchface

author: Adam Christensen
comment: Looks great on my Sony SW3. Interface on the phone companion app for tweaking settings could use some polish, but it gets the job done.

author: Zachary Robinson
comment: Love the face, but your pictures show different colors that aren't available to customize after downloading

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Be sure that all the colors on the pictures are real colors from the application! Send me an email with the corresponding picture and I will send  you back the corresponding color in the color picker. (Did you see that all the settings are in the "Android Wear" app of your mobile. Just hit the "Gear" icon displayed over the watch face preview)

title: Great Christmas watch face

author: Ismet Hadzic
comment: Like my mom did it for me :) absolutely worth to buy
title: Great

author: Chari Cayanan
comment: More than I bargained for

author: Evan
comment: five stars if you add an option for black and white ambient mode 😁

reply.author: thema
reply.content: You mean to have the text in ambient displayed in white color? This was fixed a few hours ago, it should be available now :) With some new options added too!

author: Seby Sebastian
comment: Gata am rezolvat

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. can you send me more details by email about your issue? I will be glad to help

author: Juan Rodriguez
comment: Thanks for adding the pattern on ambient mode.
title: Awesome!

author: Tyler Hell
comment: Does it only do military time?
title: Pretty good

author: Ovidiu Sirb
comment: Simple and festive.
title: Excellent Christmas watch face

comment: Get into the Christmas spirit!
title: Love it!

author: Ryder Diesburg
comment: A complete beauty 😍

reply.author: thema
reply.content: There is an option to do that. Just go in the settings screen of the watch face on your mobile (hit the "gear icon" displayed over the watch face preview, in the "Android Wear" application)

title: 12 or 24

author: Jason W
comment: Definitely recommend it
title: Very festive watchface

author: Paul Štutas
comment: Love it! Great patterns and colours!

author: Nole Hunter Lilley
comment: Fantastic!
title: Festive!

author: Jackson Blatz
comment: Neat
title: Watchface

author: April Pruitt
comment: Works great

reply.author: thema
reply.content:
Hi. If you cannot see the watch face, please go to Android Wear Application, open Settings and use Re-sync apps option.
If it does not work, please disconnect devices(watch and phone), uninstall thewatch face, restart watch and connect device again. then finally install the watchface.

author: Darren LaChausse
comment: Great

author: Eric Cochran
comment: Amazing

author: Matthew Wheeler
comment: Very festive. Battery size indicator doesn't work. Needs an option to remove the battery indicator altogether.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: An option was just added to choose the size of the battery indicator. You should be able to get it within a few hours, depending on Google's deployment duration.

title: Nice watch face

author: Matt Bianconi
comment: Nice watchface for the season. Can we swap battery for steps or weather or blank?
title: Well done

author: Jill Gundaker
comment: Love it. Very ugly in a GOOD way!
title: Sweater for your watch.

author: Nuclear Bomb
comment: This watch face is perfect!
title: I love it

author: Kris Rorke
comment: Not available on my sony SW3.
